title: Young voices of Maffra = Future leaders : Young voices of Maffra
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - Secondary - Victoria - Curricula
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Environmental protection
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/World politics
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Victoria - Rural conditions
abstract: Interviews with eight students from Maffra Secondary College
description: This film focuses on the young people of Maffra. Eight students from Maffra Secondary College were interviewed, representing all the year levels, and asked to talk about life in a regional town, their hopes for the future and issues that affect them and their world. The end result is a portrait of young rural Victorians who are thoughtful and engaging, with concerns about the environment, world politics and the survival of small towns.
